text: Stephen Kadogo Onyango (born 24 December 1990) is a Ugandan footballer, who currently plays for Kenyan club Sony Sugar F.C.Sony sugar Mjällby AIF players lining up before a 2013 Allsvenskan game. ==Club career== ===Early career=== Kadogo joined the local football club Masaka Local Council FC, having been scouted by manager Mustafa while playing on the streets of his hometown. After a year with the club, Ugandan Kampala City Council FC made a move for the player. After a two-month trial, Kadogo and fellow mawejje teammate signed youth contracts with the club in 2011. His first season saw Kadogo break into the first team squad, and later in the year Kenya premier league a made offers for the forward. ===Kampala City Council=== Kadogo was signed with an disclose transfer fee to Kampala City Council FC,and in his first season he scored 11 goals in league debut the following season, . . He played in his first international friendly that attracted the Kenyan side to sign him the following season, ==References== *Kenya Premier League *http://www.kwesesports.com/football/africa/absa-premiership/onyango-rescues- point-for-united Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Ugandan footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Kampala Capital City Authority FC players Category:SoNy Sugar F.C. players
title: Stephen Onyango
